price: 201. Diggah Yallak meesita mara Sheytan waswasak tu ken xagtek Yallih digaalaa kee Yallih meqe galto kassitan, tokkel usun bagi intih Yallih cakki yableeniih Yalli Niqbaamak yaxxeereenih.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittaqaw idhā massahum ṭāifun mina al-shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mub'ṣirūna
